text:
This place has everything you could want for a fun and delicious night out. The karaoke has wide song selection and a lively atmosphere that keeps the energy high all night.

Fresh oysters is a must-try. Flavorful, easily some of the best Iâ€™ve had. The menu offers a fantastic mix of Japanese-inspired dishes and bar favorites, all made with high-quality ingredients.

The service is top-notch, with friendly staff who make you feel welcome. Whether you're here for drinks, food, or just to sing your heart out, Thirsty Neko delivers an amazing experience. Iâ€™ll definitely be back!

If you're looking for a unique dining experience that blends great food with an inviting atmosphere, Thirsty Neko is a must-visit. This quirky Japanese-inspired bar offers a playful yet cozy vibe, if you are just looking for a fun spot to unwind, Thirsty Neko hits the mark.

The menu is a delightful fusion of Japanese comfort food and creative cocktails. What really sets Thirsty Neko apart is the drinks menu. They serve an impressive range of cocktails, including inventive drinks. The "Royal Flush" cocktail, a refreshing mix of sake, Gin, and peach, was particularly memorable.

Whether you're stopping by for a casual drink or a full meal, Thirsty Neko provides a warm, fun atmosphere thatâ€™s perfect for relaxing with friends or enjoying a quiet night out. With great food, creative drinks, and a unique vibe. Highly recommended!

My visit to Thirsty Neko was fantastic! This restaurant not only serves delicious Japanese cuisine but also captures the essence of a lively izakaya. The bar provided a great environment to unwind with friends, and the karaoke setup was the perfect way to end the night. Every detail, from the food to the ambiance, reflects a true passion for Japanese culture. I highly recommend stopping by for an unforgettable experience!
Overall nice food and vibes especially for youngsters.

The sake Oysters are totally worth it! At only 10$++ for 3 shots. The oyster are very fresh and tasty.

Prices for beers and drinks are great too.

Food portions is okay, but the taste is totally worth the value.

The staff are nice and friendly. And actively checking on us to make sure we have everything we need.

Atmosphere is really comfortable, no messy noises, the prefect place for chill drinks and gathering. Enjoyed my visit and will come again for sure ðŸ˜ƒ

We had the most wonderful time here. It has a few different settings for different gatherings! There is one that is for drinking and karaoke, there is another al fresco w live bands and another for more private event settings! Come have a good time here w frds over drinks!
